CustomField.formula:
IF ( ISPICKVAL( Statut__c ,"Va") , IMAGE("/resource/1552570497000/ICONS_ADR_Actif", "Va", 30 ,30 ) ,
IF ( ISPICKVAL( Statut__c ,"EL") , IMAGE("/resource/1557445841000/ICONS_Litige?", "EL", 30 ,30 ) ,
IF ( ISPICKVAL( Statut__c ,"NR") , IMAGE("/resource/1557446707000/ICONS_Facture_non_recue?", "NR", 30 ,30 ) ,
IF ( ISPICKVAL( Statut__c ,"PA") , IMAGE("/resource/1557446403000/ICONS_Payee?", "PA", 30 ,30 ) , ""
))))
CustomField.label: Icone statut
